page.title: 17HOME LIFE IN AYLESBURY
page.content: {Housewives} do their own {housework} daily and it takes them 2-3 hours. They don't mind it but enjoy it. Most families have 3 daily meals. Popular {meals} include: for breakfast- toast and cereal; for Sunday dinner- roast. Most women don't like buying convenience foods and they enjoy making cakes. Few people grow their own food. Instead, they shop in superstores weekly. Many women cook foreign foods and families rarely eat out or go out together. Instead, the children go to clubs. Many families have picnics, but classical {entertainment} is still popular. Most families watch television and read. Many people have videos but few hire films. Housewives listen to the radio and get newspapers daily. Most families take a yearly holiday for 1-4 weeks. Most families have pets.
